article: former premier league referee mark halsey has slammed the fa 's decision to put jon moss in charge of the fa cup final instead of mark clattenburg .

halsey said the english game would be a ` laughing stock ' over the decision to ignore clattenburg , one of only two english referees in the uefa elite ranks -- for the final between aston villa and arsenal on may 30 .
` greg dyke -lrb- chairman of the fa -rrb- has got to look at the appointment process for the fa cup referee because , frankly , it 's a joke , ' said halsey .
mark halsey has slammed the decision to overlook mark clattenburg -lrb- above -rrb- for the fa cup final on may 30 .
former premier league referee halsey -lrb- middle -rrb- has called the football association 's decision ` a joke '
` i do n't blame jon moss . but is he the best man for the job ? absolutely not .
` it 's clear mark clattenburg should be in charge . he 's consistently our outstanding referee who proves himself on the biggest stage . '

halsey thinks clattenburg , who has never refereed an fa cup final , has been overlooked as the professional game match officials board -lrb- pgmo -rrb- would prefer martin atkinson to go to euro 2016 next summer .

` we 'll be a laughing stock around the world , ' halsey wrote on sports networking site kicca . ` i do n't think the hierarchy want clattenburg to go the european championship next summer . this is their way of sending out a message to uefa that clattenburg is n't our top ref . '
halsey also said the english game would be a ` laughing stock ' over the decision to ignore clattenburg .
jon moss will take charge of fa cup final at wembley between arsenal and aston villa .
abstract: jon moss will take charge of fa cup final between arsenal and aston villa .
